plant.question: I have roots, but no feet. I give you shade, but have no seat. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I can protect you from the sun.
🍃 Birds often build nests in me.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?
I have petals and a stem, and bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I can be many different colors.
💐 I am often given as a gift.

plant.question: I start as a seed, then sprout with water and sun. What am I becoming?

hints.text: 🌱 I will grow bigger over time.

plant.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am often eaten with a spoon.
💪 I'm a good source of vitamin C.

plant.question: I am long and green, and you can often find me climbing a wall or fence. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am a type of plant.
🌱 I have tendrils that help me climb.

plant.question: I have sharp thorns and beautiful blooms. Handle me with care. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often red, but can be other colors.
💔 I am a symbol of love.

plant.question: I am a large, round fruit that is green on the outside and red on the inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very refreshing in the summer.

plant.question: I am a tall grass, and you can grind my seeds into flour to make bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I'm used to make things to eat.
🌍 I am grown all over the world.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows underground, has layers, and can make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

food.question: I am yellow, long, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I'm a fruit that grows in bunches.
🚚 You peel off my skin before eating.

food.question: I am round and juicy, and sometimes red, green, or yellow. Doctors say I keep them away. What am I?

hints.text: 🥧 You can make a pie with me.

food.question: I am white, cold, and creamy. I am a popular dessert on a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 You can add sprinkles to me.
🍧 I'm often served in a cone or cup.

food.question: I'm long and orange, rabbits love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Bugs Bunny eats me all the time.

food.question: I am made of grains and you often eat me with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You might eat me with soup.
🌾 I can be white or brown.
🥪 I am often used to make sandwiches.

food.question: I'm a small, round vegetable that makes you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍔 You can put me on a burger.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from a cow and is good for your bones. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 You can drink me with cookies.

food.question: I have a crust, cheese, and tomato sauce. I can have many toppings. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Tomato and mozzarella are common ingredients.

food.question: I'm a small green vegetable, that looks like a miniature tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 My florets look like tiny trees.
🥗 I'm a healthy addition to salads.

food.question: I am a sweet treat, often covered in chocolate, and I have a nutty filling inside. What am I?
